<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Zeal for Battle](/Spells.aspx?ID=472)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 399 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** You and at least 1 ally are about to roll initiative.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 10 feet

**Target** you and the triggering ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You stoke the righteous anger within yourself and an ally. You and the target ally each roll a d20 and use the higher result for both your initiative rolls. You each still use your own Perception modifier or other statistic to determine your results.
name: Zeal for Battle
